body.p:
Legrange Ky
Oct 8th 1863
My Dear Governor
My friends and fellow county men Captn M Oldham and R Q Sparks work to obtain authority to raise a Regiment in the military force you propose to organize.
If you commission these gentlemen I am sure they will use every exertion to recruit their Regiment and will handle it ably when raised --

Captn Oldham served in our friend Coly Jacob,s Regiment and will be endorsed by him as, in every respect competent and worthy -- Mr Sparks has frequently been employed by the Govt -- often in a military capactiy, and has rendered the Union cause as efficent aid as any man in the county
He is a gentleman of fine intelligence -- as brave and loyal as any man and of great energy of character

If you will commission them I am convinced they
will render the country important service

Very Truly
Your friend
R N Mallory
